name: Eyes World
description:
[Controls]

WASD Movement

Left click: Attack with weapon

Right click: Use powerup

V: Adjust volume

[Goal]

Defeat the eye and accumulate 10 wins. Every loss results losing 1 of your wins.

[Tips]

The weapon you choose does a random amount of damage each game.

The magic beam power up deals random damage.

Falling eyes are powerups that either heal you or hurt you.

The dormant eye in the middle could mean something important.

The weapon you pick up in game will either grant you a buff or a curse, which is shown on the top left.

[Desc]

This game was made for the Mini game jam 77 with the theme: Courage.

I interpreted this as players having to choose between two weapons in which they have no knowledge of the stats. This will be really risky for them and test their boldness.

Also, I would of added more weapons, but I already spent too much time on polishing and bug fixing. Hope you enjoy though!
